Job Description:
We are looking for Senior Software Developers to build and implement functional programs based on latest Microsoft technologies with minimum 3 years of experience in design, analysis, implementation and testing of web and client server applications. Familiarity with Test Driven Development (TDD) and Java-Script testing tool and methods (Karma). Exposure in application hosting with IIS Server. Practical understanding of MVC -4 with EDM (Entity Data Model). Required technical knowledge in Spring Boot Framework, MySQL and JQuery, ASP.Net, Ajax and Json, ASP.Net, Maven, HTML, Java, Google Analytics, ReactJS, JAVA, Websphere 8.5 

Research Expertise We link up with various data sources to provide you real time information.

Customer Service Our agents are trained to answer all your questions instantly. Get in touch with us on email or phone. No more waiting!

Simplified Reports Get instant feedback from our data partners on your applicants to take informed decisions 

Technology Automation Get instant case updates. Ordering a background screening check has never been so easy.
